name: Human Computer Interaction
tagline: Derek Buchman, Dylan Sexton, Michael Keeton, Chris Klappich
body: # Team UGASafety ## Group 5 Crime around a university campus and the general safety of students are the problems we are exploring. The University of Georgia offers some campus safety and security services; such as security cameras, foot patrols, and key card accessible dormitories. However there are still incidents on campus and students’ safety can be increased. According to UGA, the institution currently addresses safety by offering security services like 24-hour foot and vehicle patrols, lighted pathways/sidewalks, and controlled dormitory access (key, security card, etc). However, there are around 1000+ safety incidents per academic year on average. Our solution will work in tandem with current solutions to increase student awareness, police presence, and a general atmosphere of safety. *** ##Studios Studio 1 Studio 2 ##Milestones Milestone 1 ***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
